attributes.action: encourage supermarkets and shopping centres such as the Trafford Centre in Manchester to install wind turbines to generate their own electricity and help to save the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all large office blocks,large factories, supermarkets and shopping centres such as Metro Centre in Gateshead and Trafford Centre in Manchster had wind turbines on the roof it would save a huge amount of electricity.
